c1
c2
c3
c1
c2
c3
This test verifies the position and size of the highlight rectangles overlayed on an inspected CSS grid div.

inspectedGrid{
  "paths": [
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        65,
        0,
        "L",
        65,
        40,
        "L",
        0,
        40,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(255, 0, 0, 0)",
      "outlineColor": "rgba(128, 0, 0, 0)",
      "name": "content"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        65,
        0,
        "L",
        65,
        40,
        "L",
        0,
        40,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(0, 255, 0, 0)",
      "name": "padding"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        65,
        0,
        "L",
        65,
        40,
        "L",
        0,
        40,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(0, 0, 255, 0)",
      "name": "border"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        65,
        0,
        "L",
        65,
        40,
        "L",
        0,
        40,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)",
      "name": "margin"
    }
  ],
  "showRulers": true,
  "showExtensionLines": true,
  "elementInfo": {
    "tagName": "div",
    "idValue": "inspectedGrid",
    "className": ".grid",
    "nodeWidth": "65",
    "nodeHeight": "40"
  },
  "displayAsMaterial": false,
  "gridInfo": {
    "rows": {
      "origin": 0,
      "gap": 0,
      "spans": [
        20,
        20
      ]
    },
    "columns": {
      "origin": 0,
      "gap": 0,
      "spans": [
        50,
        13
      ]
    },
    "color": "rgba(128, 128, 128, 0)"
  }
}
paddedGrid{
  "paths": [
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        60,
        50,
        "L",
        125,
        50,
        "L",
        125,
        90,
        "L",
        60,
        90,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(255, 0, 0, 0)",
      "outlineColor": "rgba(128, 0, 0, 0)",
      "name": "content"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        185,
        0,
        "L",
        185,
        140,
        "L",
        0,
        140,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(0, 255, 0, 0)",
      "name": "padding"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        185,
        0,
        "L",
        185,
        140,
        "L",
        0,
        140,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(0, 0, 255, 0)",
      "name": "border"
    },
    {
      "path": [
        "M",
        0,
        0,
        "L",
        185,
        0,
        "L",
        185,
        140,
        "L",
        0,
        140,
        "Z"
      ],
      "fillColor": "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)",
      "name": "margin"
    }
  ],
  "showRulers": true,
  "showExtensionLines": true,
  "elementInfo": {
    "tagName": "div",
    "idValue": "paddedGrid",
    "className": ".grid.padded",
    "nodeWidth": "185",
    "nodeHeight": "140"
  },
  "displayAsMaterial": false,
  "gridInfo": {
    "rows": {
      "origin": 50,
      "gap": 0,
      "spans": [
        20,
        20
      ]
    },
    "columns": {
      "origin": 60,
      "gap": 0,
      "spans": [
        50,
        13
      ]
    },
    "color": "rgba(128, 128, 128, 0)"
  }
}
